name: Home-Fried Potatoes
author: dakota kelly
summary: Yummy 'home-style' fried potatoes. Chunky and flavorful fried potatoes with onion, green pepper and parsley.
ingredients: 1  green bell pepper, seeded and chopped
directions: Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil
Add potatoes and cook until tender but still firm, about 15 minutes
Drain, cool cut into 1/2 inch cubes
In a large skillet, heat 1 tablespoon olive oil over medium high heat
Cook, stirring often, until soft; about 5 minutes
Transfer to a plate and set aside
Pour remaining 2 tablespoons of oil into the skillet and turn heat to medium-high
Add potato cubes, salt, paprika and black pepper
Cook, stirring occasionally, until potatoes are browned; about 10 minutes
Stir in the onions, green peppers and parsley and cook for another minute
